channel.title: Chicago Mutual Aid Requests
channel.description: Emma's list of Chicago Mutual Aid Requests

item.title: Items needed: strollers, car seat, grocery cart, backpack
item.description: Via Edgewater Mutual Aid Network. Asking for donations of a newborn stroller, infant stroller, infant car seat (5 months) with base, small grocery cart, and lightly used camping backpack. Only items in good repair. Contact EMAN at the email/phone number at the link to arrange a pick-up or drop-off of items. Link to more info.

item.title: Monetary donations/items needed: new hats, scarves, gloves
item.description: Via Irving Park Food Pantry. Asking for donations of new hats, scarves, and gloves to distribute at their annual Thanksgiving meal distribution. They have many different drop-off locations listed at the link, and are accepting drop-offs until Sunday, November 17th. Hats, scarves, and gloves only please, they don't have room for other items. At the link, they also have options for buying items from their Amazon wishlist or making a monetary donation to go towards buying winterwear items. Link to more info.

item.title: Items needed: winterwear, snacks, ventra cards, and more
item.description: Via Chicago Community Jail Support. Asking for donations of coats (size L-3XL), thick hoodies, thick sweaters, hand warmers, gloves, winter hats, warm calf/knee-length socks, newport cigarettes, individual chip packs, beef jerky, fruit snacks, chewy granola bars, gatorade bottles, water bottles/cans, single-ride ventra cards. Link to more info.
